dango-rain/addedBy: Dango rain added by Scratch Addons browser extension.
dango-rain/happyAprilFools: Happy April Fools Day from the Scratch Addons developers!
dango-rain/howToGet: If you want other Scratch Addons users to see dango rain when visiting your profile, include the word "dango" in your "About Me" or "What I'm Working On".
dango-rain/howToStop: If you wish to stop seeing dango rain in profiles before April Fools Day ends, search for "dango rain" in Scratch Addons settings and disable the feature.
